frontmatter.description: Verbose logging in development is one of the few things I miss about Ruby on Rails. I made two libraries to bring that to Go and explain how to set that up with middleware.

frontmatter.description: In this article I’ll be showing you how to compile the Go script, setup the AWS Lambda function, and configure a cron type job to run the script every hour.
